text: aur us ki qaum daudti hoyi us ke paas aa pahonchi, wo to pehle hee se badh-kaariyo mein mubtela thi, looth alaihissalaam ne kaha aye qaum ke logo ye hai meri betiya jo tumhare liye bahuth hee pakiza hai, Allah se daro aur mujhe mere mehmano ke bare mein ruswa na karo, kya tum mein ek bhi bhala aadmi nahi
